amendment.description: To provide for the substitution of the United States in certain civil actions.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3927 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 30 - 68. Record Vote Number: 17.

action.text: Amendment SA 3927 proposed by Senator Specter to Amendment SA 3911. (consideration: CR S712-714) To provide for the substitution of the United States in certain civil actions.
